      • determineMove

        public java.util.List<Node> determineMove()
        Provides the user of the program with an input loop to play the game. This loop does all the related TUI actions.
        Returns:
        A list of the placed moves. This is to be send to the server.

      • handToString

        Translates the hand of the player to a string.
        Parameters:
        aHand - The hand to convert to string.
        Returns:
        The resulting string representation of the hand.
